column2: line.plot= ggplot(airline.data, aes(x = flight_hour, y = after_stat(count), group = num_passengers, color = passengers)) +
labs(x = "Flight Departure Hour", y = "Count", title = "Trends by Flight Hour for Different Passenger Groups") +
scale_color_manual(name="Number of Passengers", values = kacys) +  # Set custom color palette
